patterns: What kinds of items are there?

patterns: What payment methods do you accept?

We accept most major credit cards, and Paypal

patterns: When do I get my delivery?

responses: Delivery typically takes 2-4 days
Shipping usually takes 2-4 days

Why did the hipster burn his mouth? He drank the coffee before it was cool.
What did the buffalo say when his son left for college? Bison.
Why don't eggs tell jokes? Because they'd crack each other up!
I told my wife she was drawing her eyebrows too high. She looked surprised.

patterns: Can I check my order status?
How can I track my order?
responses: Sure! Please provide your order number and I'll check the status for you.

Your order is currently being processed. You'll receive a notification once it's ready for pickup or delivery.

patterns: Can I connect to wifi here?
responses: Yes, we provide complimentary wifi to our customers.
Wifi is available for customers. The password is 'coffee123'.
